Title: Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah releases Axiom
Description: Continues to push jazz fusion with modern and political themes.

Title: Esperanza Spalding releases Songwrights Apothecary Lab
Description: An experimental album combining music and wellness practices.

Title: Kamasi Washington releases Heaven and Earth
Description: Explores themes of social justice and spirituality with a grand sound.

Title: Immanuel Wilkins releases The 7th Hand
Description: A highly praised album reflecting modern jazz’s evolving voice.

Title: Jazz at Lincoln Center expands virtual programming
Description: Adapts to new digital audiences amid ongoing global changes.

Title: Nubya Garcia releases Source
Description: Celebrated for blending London jazz with Afro-Caribbean influences.
